pr_title: Assign a new ID to client only registry entries when syncing.

timeline.message:
Assign a new ID to client only registry entries when syncing.

Fixes #1165

timeline.bodyText: Could you include which registry entry failed to be reassigned?
timeline.author: i509VCB

replies.bodyText: Also should this throw a RemapException instead?
replies.author: i509VCB
